name: sandbox
description: Sandbox to play around with node

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../notes-front/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../notes-back
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy && npm run git:fso
scripts.git:fso: cd ../ && git add -A && git commit -m uibuild && git push && cd notes-back/
